languages.text: Леди-Навигатор не ладит с командой, что приводит к форс-мажорам на корабле. Мастер вокса просит Вольного Торговца поговорить с Кассией, дабы исправить ситуацию.

traits.locale_text: Леди-Навигатор не ладит с командой, что приводит к аварийным ситуациям на корабле. Мастер Вокса просит Вольного Торговца поговорить с Кассией, дабы смягчить ситуацию.

languages.text: The Lady Navigator is at odds with the crew, which is causing serious problems on the ship. The Vox Master has asked the Rogue Trader to speak to Cassia to remedy the situation.
languages.original_text: Леди-Навигатор не ладит с командой, что приводит к форс-мажорам на корабле. Мастер вокса просит Вольного Торговца поговорить с Кассией, дабы исправить ситуацию.

traits.locale_text: The Lady Navigator is at odds with the crew, which is causing serious problems on the ship. The Vox Master has asked the Rogue Trader to speak to Cassia to remedy the situation.
The Lady Navigator is at odds with the crew, which is causing serious problems on the ship. The Vox Master has asked the Rogue Trader to speak to Cassia to remedy the situation.
The Lady Navigator is at odds with the crew, which is causing serious problems on the ship. The Vox Master has asked the Rogue Trader to speak to Cassia to remedy the situation.
The Lady Navigator is at odds with the crew, which is causing serious problems on the ship. The Vox Master has asked the Rogue Trader to speak to Cassia to remedy the situation.

languages.text: 导航者女士与船员们相处不睦，还在船上引发了严重的问题。音阵大师请求行商浪人与卡西娅谈谈，改变这样的情况。
languages.original_text: The Lady Navigator is at odds with the crew, which is causing serious problems on the ship. The Vox Master has asked the Rogue Trader to speak to Cassia to remedy the situation.

traits.locale_text: 导航者女士与船员们相处不睦，还在船上引发了严重的问题。音阵大师请求行商浪人与卡西娅谈谈，改变这样的情况。

languages.text: 航宙士の女性はクルーと対立しており、船内で深刻な問題が発生している。ヴォクス・マスターは自由開拓者に状況を改善するためにカシアと話すように依頼した。
languages.original_text: The Lady Navigator is at odds with the crew, which is causing serious problems on the ship. The Vox Master has asked the Rogue Trader to speak to Cassia to remedy the situation.

traits.locale_text: 航宙士の女性はクルーと対立しており、船内で深刻な問題が発生している。ヴォクス・マスターは自由開拓者に状況を改善するためにカシアと話すように依頼した。

languages.text: La Lady Navegante está enfrentándose a la tripulación, causando graves problemas en la nave. La maestra de vocos pide a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente que hable con Cassia para remediar la situación.
languages.original_text: The Lady Navigator is at odds with the crew, which is causing serious problems on the ship. The Vox Master has asked the Rogue Trader to speak to Cassia to remedy the situation.

traits.locale_text: La Lady Navegante está enfrentándose a la tripulación, causando graves problemas en la nave. La maestra de vocos pide a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente que hable con Cassia para remediar la situación.

languages.text: Die Lady Navigatorin ist mit der Crew uneins, was zu ernsthaften Problemen auf dem Schiff führt. Die Voxmeisterin hat {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} gebeten, mit Cassia zu reden, um die Situation zu bereinigen.
languages.original_text: The Lady Navigator is at odds with the crew, which is causing serious problems on the ship. The Vox Master has asked the Rogue Trader to speak to Cassia to remedy the situation.

traits.locale_text: Die Lady Navigatorin ist mit der Crew uneins, was zu ernsthaften Problemen auf dem Schiff führt. Die Voxmeisterin hat {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} gebeten, mit Cassia zu reden, um die Situation zu bereinigen.

languages.text: La dame navigatrice est en conflit avec l'équipage, ce qui risque d'avoir de graves répercussions sur le vaisseau. La maîtresse-vox a demandé {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} de parler à Cassia pour désamorcer la situation.
languages.original_text: The Lady Navigator is at odds with the crew, which is causing serious problems on the ship. The Vox Master has asked the Rogue Trader to speak to Cassia to remedy the situation.

traits.locale_text: La dame navigatrice est en conflit avec l'équipage, ce qui risque d'avoir de graves répercussions sur le vaisseau. La maîtresse-vox a demandé {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} de parler à Cassia pour désamorcer la situation.

languages.text: Leydi Rotacı, tayfayla anlaşmazlık yaşıyor ve bu da gemide ciddi sorunlara yol açıyor. Voks Üstadı, Hür Tacir'den bu durumu çözmek için Cassia'yla konuşmasını talep etti.
languages.original_text: The Lady Navigator is at odds with the crew, which is causing serious problems on the ship. The Vox Master has asked the Rogue Trader to speak to Cassia to remedy the situation.
